result.arabic_text: قُلۡ إِن كَانَتۡ لَكُمُ ٱلدَّارُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةُ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَالِصَةٗ مِّن دُونِ ٱلنَّاسِ فَتَمَنَّوُاْ ٱلۡمَوۡتَ إِن كُنتُمۡ صَٰدِقِينَ
result.translation: Ntumwa y’Imana! Bwira Abayahudi uti: “Nimwaba mufise Ubwami bw’ijuru bwanyu bwite ku Mana Allah, mugenewe mwebwe gusa ata bandi bantu barimwo, nimwipfuze rero urupfu maze mupfe, mubwinjire nimwaba muri imvugakuri!”.
